name: Verify Intro Video Playback
description: Validates that the introduction video plays correctly and displays the final message as expected.
testObjective: Ensure the intro video sequence functions properly and provides the expected narrative conclusion.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Launch the game through Steam Client
steps.expected: Game launches successfully and intro video begins playing immediately

steps.action: Observe the video playing through the projector on the wall
Wait for the video to complete
steps.expected: Video completes and displays final frame with message: 'Galactic Fruit thanks you for your sacrifice.'

steps.action: Continue observing to check for looping behavior
steps.expected: Video does not loop and remains on final frame

postconditions: Player can proceed to interact with environment
